component.name: SANsurfer Switch Manager
component.summary: QLogic Fibre Channel Switch Management tool

description.p: This is a build of SANsurfer Switch Manager for Linux, packaged into a Flatpak.
Help viewing is provided by NetSurf (a multi-platform lightweight web browser) https://www.netsurf-browser.org
Sandbox permissions are as limited as possible ...
NOTE: The Preferences files must be created manually ...
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by QLogic Corporation
These release notes describe the changes, fixes, known issues, and release details that apply to QLogic SANbox and Sanbox2 switch product family, GUI version: 5.00.1.09 and firmware version 5.0.1.10.

This document provides details of the modifications and/or enhancements made between versions 5.00.01.4 and 5.00.1.09 of the QLogic SANsurfer Switch Manager for SANbox and SANbox2 switch product families. Version 5.0.1.10 adds support for the SANbox 1400 4Gb fibre channel switch and adds localization of specific languages. Version 5.00.1.09 should only be used in conjunction with 5.0.1 switch firmware.
The following changes have been made to the QLogic SANsurfer Switch Manager for SANbox and SANbox2 between versions 5.00.01.4 and 5.00.1.09.

ul.li: Added support for the SANbox 1400 4Gb fibre channel switch - 10 Port Switch (All 1Gb/2Gb/4Gb ports) - External Power Supply - Only one ISL allowed by default
Added localization support for English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese (Brazilian), Korean, Japanese, and Chinese (Simplified) languages.
